question: Name the important tourist attractions in Teruel, Spain.
true_answer: Mausoleum of the Lovers of Teruel, El Torico, and Dinópolis.
asked_question_translated: Nämn de viktigaste turistattraktionerna i Teruel, Spanien.
answer: Viktiga turistattraktioner i Teruel inkluderar Mudejar-arkitekturens monument, som Torre del Salvador och katedralen i Teruel, samt Plaza del Torico och de älskade statyerna av Los Amantes de Teruel.
answer_translated_eng: Major tourist attractions in Teruel include the monuments of Mudejar architecture, such as the Torre del Salvador and the Cathedral of Teruel, as well as the Plaza del Torico and the beloved statues of Los Amantes de Teruel.
